name: Mutt I'm so itchy spray 100ml
description:
For all you dogs out there. This is the spray for you. The soothing spray that lets you play all day and sleep at night. You can kiss your itchy bits goodbye.
Give a "woof" to your owners if you want them to buy it for you.

name: Sample Size for any product in stock
description:
Want to try it out?
Pick the sample size option! You will get 1g posted to you at a cheaper postage rate  and you will get to try out the products before you buy the real deal.
Just state the sample you want and select the amount.
I like the sound of that....

name: Oh no cold sore balm 4.7g tube full size
description:
The name says it all. When you've got that "oh no I think I'm getting a cold sore!" moment in your life.
Soothing and tingly balm to help speed up the healing process of those ugly cold sore lumps on lovely lips.
Made from hemp seed oil of course, peppermint, white camphor, tea tree.

name: "Helping Hand" salve for us people 4.7g pot or tube
description:
Multi purpose soothing balm for humans. Just like the pet version but has more nice stuff in it for us humans.
Used for all sorts of things such as, cuts, bites, stings, rash, burns(used on burns to prevent the skin from drying and itching), skin allergies. 
I have tested this on cats, rats, dogs and myself and because it's so good I came up with this human version (because we are much bigger in size we need a much bigger dose of all the nice stuff).
Contains good stuff such as: hemp seed oil, cocoa butter, shea-butter, avocado oil, macadamia oil, olive oil, tea tree, rose-hip oil, vitamin e, emu oil and vertiver. Pleasant smelling (so you tell us what essential oil you want in it and I'll pt it in!. Saves all the time and hassle of finding a balm or salve your not allergic to!).
Essential oil choices are: Lavender, Eucalyptus, Sweet Orange,  Lemongrass, Cedarwood, Citronella, lemon, Mandarin.

*Does not contain lavender or neem seed oil (too many people have allergies and pregnant woman can't use neem seed oil)
*Not to be taken internally, so please try not to eat it.

name: Furry friends pet salve 4.7g pot or tube
description:
Multi purpose soothing balm for pets. Pleasant smelling with lavender to hide the tea tree smell. Used for all sorts of things such as, cuts, bites, stings, rash, foot-pad blisters/ wear (can happen), skin allergies. 
I have tested this on cats, rats, dogs and myself and because it's so good I came up with a human version (because we are much bigger in size we need a much bigger dose of all the nice stuff).
Contains good stuff such as: hemp seed oil, cocoa butter, shea-butter, avocado oil, macadamia oil, olive oil, tea tree, lavender, vitamin e, neem seed oil (neem-seed oil is excellent on animals and has wonderful properties to assist skin with healing and vertiver.
*Contains lavender oil so if you are allergic then tell me to take it out.
*Neem-seed oil is not to be used by preganant women (can be taken out if you wish).
